feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 9:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:59 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:59 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:59 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
